entry.title: Taza Natural White Volcanic Lava Exfoliating Body Wash
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc. (CAN)
Type: Shower Gels
Price: 16.79 - 20.99 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Natural White Volcanic Lava Body Wash has a mild, rich lathering formula and contains moisturizers to make your skin feel soft and smooth. In addition, it rejuvenates and exfoliates to give your skin a younger looking appearance. It rinses clean leaving a beautiful fresh scent. The following are additional features of this body wash:

  • 97% Natural No Parabens No Phthalates No Sulphates Suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive
  • Contains White Volcanic Lava from the Auvergne region of France, where more than 80 volcanoes erupted between 100,000 and 7000 years ago. The beautiful scenery of Europe was carved from these volcanoes and explains the natural mineral springs- famous for its healing spa's. The White Lava Powder cleanses and exfoliates, with a light scrubbing action removes dirt and tired skin from the body. 
  • Contains Glycerin, which is a humectant that attracts water like a magnet for treating dry, dehydrated skin
  • Contains Aloe Leaf Juice, which soothes, calms, and provides anti-inflammatory benefits for your skin

Key ingredients: White Volcanic Lava Powder, Aloe Leaf Juice & Glycerin, All of our body washes are paraben, phthalates and sulphate free, and suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive.

Prefer to shop for this product on Amazon.ca? No problem, we sell this product there too. Click Taza Natural White Volcanic Lava Exfoliating Lava Body Wash to be redirected to this product's detail page on Amazon.ca.

Get your Taza Natural White Volcanic Lava Body Wash.

entry.title: Taza Tea Tree Oil and Activated Charcoal Natural Soap (Pack of 3)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Priya Spa Inc.
Type: Soaps
Price: 21.59 - 26.99 (4 variants)

*Free Standard Shipping; *Orders from this site Fulfillment by Amazon.ca; *Secure & Protected Cardholder Data Processing with Shopify Payments

Taza Tea Tree Oil and Activated Charcoal Natural Soap provides mild cleansing and keeps your skin soft, radiant, glowing, and healthy. It also regenerates and moisturizes your skin. Essential Oil. The following are additional features of this soap: 

  • 100% Handmade • No Parabens • No Phthalates • No Sulphates • Suitable for all skin types including the most sensitive • Palm Fruit Oil and all other ingredients are obtained only from environmentally responsible and sustainable sources
  • Contains Activated Bamboo Charcoal which absorb minerals, toxins, impurities, and other harmful substances from your skin, leaving your skin stronger and healthier; this ingredient also acts as a natural exfoliant to remove dead skin cells and is an effective, natural treatment for acne; moreover, the Activated Bamboo Charcoal enables this soap to clean deep inside your skin pores
  • Contains Tea Tree Oil which is known to help clear up acne without being overly drying. This oil is also a natural antiseptic, helping to reduce bacteria and inflammation on your skin’s surface; Tea Tree Oil is very effective in resolving body odor issues - as it contains antibacterial properties which deals with embarrassing smells
  • Contains Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, and Palm Fruit Oil which assists the anti-wrinkle process and prevents wrinkles, skin sagging, and premature aging for a younger looking appearance
  • Contains Kaolin Clay which detoxifies and cleanses your skin and removes dull skin layers for remarkable skin regeneration

Key ingredients: Tea Tree Essential Oil, Activated Bamboo Charcoal, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Palm Fruit Oil, Mango Butter, and Kaolin Clay.
